long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Odusee Toolbar has redefined and revolutionised the way we search in a browser-embedded toolbar. Providing users with greater freedom in finding the information that they always wanted, Odusee is easy-to-install gives quick and reliable results.

This exciting, new web application combines the power of search engine and the intuitive simplicity of a widget. Whether you are a casual Internet user to a serious online entrepreneur, there is always something for you.

Features in v1.0.4

* The service is free and requires no user-registration or sign-up
* Choose eight search categories: Daily Deals, Jobs, Property, Flights, Hotels, Motoring, Business, and Freelance.
* Drop down menu to change categories and search parameters.
* Auto-suggestion feature when typing location (available in Hotels and Flights).
* Good search location accuracy.
* Connects search queries to Odusee website for the generated search results.
* Fast loading time.
* All searches results are limited to Australia only.

It works well with the Odusee Search Bar Plug-ins (Supported categories: Jobs, Property, Business, Motoring, Freelance, and Daily Deals).
